articles.title: Marine Heatwaves Are Sweeping the Seafloor Around North America - Marine Technology News
articles.description: Heatwaves unfolding on the bottom of the ocean can be more intense and last longer than those on the sea surface, new research suggests…
articles.content:
Heatwaves unfolding on the bottom of the ocean can be more intense and last longer than those on the sea surface, new research suggests, but such extremes in the deep ocean are often overlooked.
